flexibilityDesc: Combining visual development speed with the precision of code, a platform leveraging powerful workflow engines like n8n offers a unique approach. Start with intuitive drag-and-drop tools for rapid prototyping and standard tasks. When complexity increases, seamlessly switch to code for fine-grained control and custom logic integration.
flexibilityPoint1: Connect directly with external APIs using standard cURL commands within your workflows.
flexibilityPoint2: Extend capabilities further by incorporating libraries from npm or Python's package index.
flexibilityPoint3: Leverage JavaScript or Python for sophisticated custom functions and precise data handling.
flexibilityPoint4: Finally, manage intricate processes effectively with advanced flow controls like branch merging.

dbHeroDesc: We design and manage self-healing MySQL (Galera, Percona, MariaDB), PostgreSQL, and MongoDB architectures. Ensure your data is consistent, secure, and always available—even during high traffic spikes.
dbHeroLocation: Expert services available in Munich (Bayern) and remotely.
dbMysqlDesc: Specialized in designing architectures that never fail. From synchronous Galera Cluster and Percona XtraDB to high-performance asynchronous replication setups.
dbMysqlPoint1: Galera / Percona Cluster: Multi-master synchronous replication ensuring zero data loss and high availability.
dbMysqlPoint2: ProxySQL & Load Balancing: Intelligent query routing, caching, and connection multiplexing for massive scale.
dbMysqlPoint3: Replication Topologies: Master-Slave, Master-Master, and delayed replicas for disaster recovery scenarios.
dbPostgresDesc: Robust architecture for mission-critical data. Leveraging PostgreSQL's advanced features for reliability, performance, and geospatial data.
dbPostgresPoint1: High Availability (Patroni): Automated failover using Etcd/Consul to minimize downtime.
dbPostgresPoint2: Performance Tuning: Advanced vacuum tuning, index optimization, and slow query analysis.
dbPostgresPoint3: PgBouncer: Efficient connection pooling for high-throughput environments.
dbServiceDRDesc: Emergency data rescue, Point-in-Time Recovery (PITR), and handling corruption or accidental 'DROP TABLE' scenarios.
dbServiceUpgradeDesc: Zero-downtime migrations to Cloud (AWS RDS, GCP) and major version upgrades (e.g., MySQL 5.7 to 8.0).
dbServiceFixDesc: Resolving deadlocks, slow queries, replication lags, foreign key issues, and server stability problems.
